actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to exempt family farms and nonhazardous small businesses from the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.
short_title: Occupational Safety and Health Amendments of 1979

summary.text: Occupational Safety and Health Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Occupational Safety Act of 1970 to exempt firms or non-hazardous businesses with 25 or less employees from coverage under such Act. Defines "non-hazardous business" as any business with an occupational injury incidence rate not exceeding seven percent.

titles.title: Occupational Safety and Health Amendments of 1979
A bill to exempt family farms and nonhazardous small businesses from the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.
